DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : OTHER NEWS
DOC.TEXT: Whirlpool Subject of Justice_Department Probe : The appliance maker ' s stock fell_in heavy trading after word leaked_out that it was being investigated by federal antitrust authorities.The leaker was its jilted former customer , Best Buy . County Natwest analyst Nicholas Heymann said the probe could make_it difficult for Whirlpool to raise prices , something the company needs to do to protect its profits . Whirlpool spokeswoman Robin Skiles said the company decided to stop selling its Whirlpool brand through Best Buy because Best Buy operates largely as a discount warehouse operation and this conflicts with Whirlpool ' s strategy .
